news.title: Snapchat gives parents new insights into teens’ screen time and friends
news.summary: With these new features, Snap is likely looking to appease regulators and parents over concerns about safety and screen time on its platform.

news.title: Quadric rides the shift from cloud AI to on-device inference — and it’s paying off
news.summary: Quadric aims to help companies and governments build programmable on-device AI chips that can run fast-changing models locally.

news.title: Tiger Global, Microsoft to fully exit Walmart-backed PhonePe via its IPO
news.summary: Tiger Global and Microsoft are offering up their full stakes in the company, while Walmart is choosing to retain its majority stake, and selling up to 45.9 million shares.

news.summary: Big tech companies and upcoming startups want to use generative AI to build software and hardware for kids. news.title: Hundreds of creatives warn against an AI slop future
news.summary: Around 800 artists, writers, actors, and musicians signed on to a new campaign against what they call "theft at a grand scale" by AI companies. news.title: Blue Origin’s Starlink rival TeraWave promises 6-terabit satellite internet
news.summary: SpaceX has the most internet-beaming satellites in its constellation, but the competition is coming, and now Jeff Bezos' space company, Blue Origin, has announced the TeraWave network.
